I reached out to an Amazon agent name Pavan. he told me that it has to do with the items being readily available I find that not to be true because a friend of mine ordered the same exact item I ordered and it was at their house very next day my stuff was delivered a week after ordering.

text: i am a longtime amazon customer but i must call out amazon is awful android application there simply is no excuse for amazon business and uselessness in certain product search i will focus on two problem product search for example how is it i can search for a book titled simply macklin and said book which is sold by amazon come up nowhere on the first few page of result try it and see the content and device page is utterly useless try it yourself it simply hang full stop
original_text: I am a long-time Amazon customer, but I must call out Amazon's awful Android app. There simply is no excuse for its bugginess and uselessness in certain product searches. I will focus on two problems: 1) Product searches.
